snippet: The Kenyan military led an African Union operation against the Shabab in southern Somalia on Thursday in an effort to vanquish the group that claimed responsibility for an attack on a Kenyan mall.
abstract: Kenyan military leads African Union operation against Islamist militants in southern Somalia in  effort to vanquish the Shabab, group that claims responsibility for terrorist attack on the Westgate mall in Nairobi.
lead_paragraph: The Kenyan military led an African Union operation against the Shabab in southern Somalia on Thursday in an effort to vanquish the group that claimed responsibility for an attack on a Kenyan mall.
